FuncDef:
The ftp client resumable-transfer enable command enables the resumable transfer function on the FTP client.
The undo ftp client resumable-transfer enable command disables the resumable transfer function on the FTP client. The ftp client resumable-transfer enable command enables the resumable transfer function on the FTP client. The undo ftp client resumable-transfer enable command disables the resumable transfer function on the FTP client. By default, the resumable transfer service of FTP client is disabled.
ExtraInfo: You can run this command to enable the resumable file transfer service on the FTP client to implement resumable file transfer.
